trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Plainfield
There were no other sightings in Plainfield on or around May 24th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was learning about cities on the moon at 4:08am. Went the clearwater subdivision power went out. I went to my bedroom window. During this time I began to observer a light. in the night sky that was moving but not flashing. As I continued to observer this object. It fade as it on its path. As I continued to watch the night sky. I went to my back yard to observe the stars. To my delight there was another light in the sky. but smaller. The time was appoximately 4:51am. It seem to be heading in the same area or direction as the first one I saw. It also fade until it was not seen. Then at 6:12am the power was back on. But, I dont think that had any thing to do with that.
